name: You're already dead, so let's seize the day!
name_original: You're already dead, so let's seize the day!
description:
You're already dead, so let's seize the day! is a game developed by Kouda Ha. It came out on 17-10-2020.
You're already dead, so let's seize the day! is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
